alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 26 at 12:26PM CDT until March 26 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Alabama, including the following county, Choctaw. * WHEN...Until 130 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1224 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Butler, Red Springs, Land, West Butler, Bogueloosa, Needham, Jackson Spur, Mount Sterling, Hodgewood, Little Walker, Ararat, Okatuppa, Eiler, Hinton, Lavaca, Melvin and Evansboro.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
